##[Department of Public Works](#)

This potholes data set is a record of potholes for one day by the Department of Public Works in the City of Syracuse, NY. This data includes the time, date, and location of when a pothole is filled.

[Data Download](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/samedelstein/RoadData/master/PotholesFilled.csv)
